title: Creating an Inequality
text: First, we must transfer the word problem into an inequality that represents Anna's rent (r).

title: Creating an Inequality
text: We know that Emma's monthly income must be at least three times the rent. So, we have the inequality $$3r \leq 5625$$

title: Solving the Inequality
text: Now, we must solve the inequality for r by algebrically manipulating it.

title: Solving the Inequality
text: To do this, we can divide both sides by 3 to isolate r. We now have $$r \leq 1875$$ as our inequality.

title: Creating a Sentence-Answer
text: Since r must be less than or equal to 1,875 dollars, what is the maximum rent?
